Package effects

Class TextFadeEffect.Frame

java.lang.Object
effects.TextFadeEffect.Frame
All Implemented Interfaces:
EffectFrame
Enclosing class:
TextFadeEffect
private static class TextFadeEffect.Frame
extends java.lang.Object
implements EffectFrame
This nested class serves to abstract away the information pertaining to each frame of the Effect

  • Constructor Details

    • Frame

      public Frame​(Text text, java.awt.Color color, int yRise)
      Instantiates the Frame instance with the provided information
      Parameters:
      text - The text to be displayed
      color - The color of the text being displayed
      yRise - The amount of y-axis travel on the text

  • Method Details

    • drawFrame

      public void drawFrame​(java.awt.Graphics2D graphics, int x, int y)
      Draws the frame to the screen via the Graphics2D object graphics provided. The frame will be drawn at x,y, with the yRise adjusting the y co-ordinate provided
      Specified by:
      drawFrame in interface EffectFrame
      Parameters:
      graphics - The graphics instance with which the frame will be drawn to the screen
      x - The position of the frame on the x-axis
      y - The position of the frame on the y-axis
